bloodrage.title: bloodrage
bloodrage.name: [color=#a03030]Sum Uri[/color]
bloodrage.description:
Apply [color=#a03030]Bloodrage[/color] to yourself and remove all [color=#ff2020]Bleed[/color]

Gain additional [color=#a03030]Bloodrage[/color] for each removed [color=#ff2020]Bleed[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Bloodrage grants bonus speed and accuracy dice for 5 turns[/color]

[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]kill[/color] an enemy unit while under the effects of [color=#a03030]Bloodrage[/color]
bloodrage.description_short:
Apply 2 [color=#a03030]Bloodrage[/color] to yourself and remove all [color=#ff2020]Bleed[/color]
Apply [color=#a03030]Bloodrage[/color] equal to the stacks of [color=#ff2020]Bleed[/color]
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]kill[/color] an enemy unit while under the effects of [color=#a03030]Bloodrage[/color]

halhala.title: halhala
halhala.name: [color=#a03030]Ur Halhala[/color]
halhala.description:
[color=#ffff50]Deal[/color] [color=#ff2020]Blood[/color] damage to all units in a 2 tile range

Repeats for each [color=#a03030]Bloodrage[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 15 * weapon size[/color]

[color=#78bca4]+2 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]enter[/color] a new area
halhala.description_short:
Deal [color=#ff2020]Blood[/color] damage to all units in a 2 tile range
Add 1 [color=#78bca4]charge[/color] to [color=#a03030]Sum Uri[/color]
[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = Weapon Size * Bloodrage stacks * 5[/color]
[color=#78bca4]+2 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]enter[/color] a new area

damu.title: damu
damu.name: [color=#a03030]Ur Damu[/color]
damu.description:
[color=#50ff50]Heal[/color] yourself for 25% of max Life

Apply [color=#ff2020]Bleed[/color] to yourself 3 times

[color=#a0a0a0]Bleed deals Blood damage every turn for 3 turns[/color]

[color=#78bca4]+2 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]enter[/color] a new area
damu.description_short:
[color=#50ff50]Heal[/color] yourself for 25% of [color=#ff8080]max Life[/color]
Apply 10 [color=#ff2020]Bleed[/color] to yourself
[color=#78bca4]+2 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]enter[/color] a new area

meditate.title: meditate
meditate.name: [color=#8080f0]Med Vohu[/color]
meditate.description:
[color=#50ff50]Heal[/color] yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Heal = 4 * WIL[/color]

[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]enter[/color] a new area
meditate.description_short:
[color=#50ff50]Heal[/color] 200
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]enter[/color] a new area

awe.title: awe
awe.name: [color=#8080f0]Yazata[/color]
awe.description:
[color=#ffff50]Deal[/color] [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage to all units in a 4 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 2 * (DEX+WIL)[/color]

[color=#e05050]*Penalized by inflexible armor[/color]

[color=#78bca4]+2 charge[/color] when you [color=#78bca4]recite[/color] the [color=#8080f0]Med Vohu[/color]
awe.description_short:
Deal 100 [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage to all enemies in a 4 tile range
[color=#78bca4]+2 charge[/color] when you [color=#78bca4]recite[/color] the [color=#8080f0]Med Vohu[/color]

vendi.title: vendi
vendi.name: [color=#8080f0]Vendi[/color]
vendi.description:
[color=#ffff50]Deal[/color] [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage to the closest enemy

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 5 * (STR+WIL)[/color]

[color=#78bca4]+3 charge[/color] when you [color=#78bca4]recite[/color] the [color=#8080f0]Yazata[/color]
vendi.description_short:
Deal 200 [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage to the closest enemy, [color=#ffff50]repeat[/color] per stack of [color=#80a0f0]Grace[/color]
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you [color=#78bca4]recite[/color] the [color=#8080f0]Yazata[/color]

leget.title: leget
leget.name: [color=#20af20]Leget Mhor[/color]
leget.description:
[color=#50ff50]Heal[/color] yourself for 15 life and remove all [color=#20af20]Sickness[/color]

[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when an [color=#ffff50]enemy dies[/color] while [color=#ffff50]standing on sacred grass[/color]
leget.description_short:
[color=#50ff50]Heal[/color] 150 and remove all [color=#20af20]Sickness[/color]
[color=#50ff50]Heal[/color] 150 life to all allies in a 2 tile range
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when an [color=#ffff50]enemy dies[/color] while [color=#ffff50]standing on divine grass[/color]

alu.title: alu
alu.name: [color=#20af20]Uttuk Alu[/color]
alu.description:
Uses [color=#78bca4]all charges[/color]

Deal [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage to all units in a 2 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = Charges used * 4 * WIL[/color]

[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when an [color=#ffff50]enemy dies[/color] while [color=#ffff50]standing on sacred grass[/color]
alu.description_short:
Uses [color=#78bca4]all charges[/color]
Deal 50 [color=#a0a0a0]* charges used[/color] [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage to all units in a 2 tile range
Create [color=#20af20]divine grass[/color] in a 1 tile range
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when an [color=#ffff50]enemy dies[/color] while [color=#ffff50]standing on divine grass[/color]

musma.title: musma
musma.name: [color=#20af20]Loh Musma[/color]
musma.description:
Summon a [color=#20af70]Musmahu[/color]

Set your [color=#20af20]Uttuk Alu[/color] [color=#78bca4]charges[/color] to 30

[color=#78bca4]+2 charge[/color] when [color=#ffff50]your glory rises[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Musmahus are gigantic serpents of Ninhurs that attack with poison and death[/color]
musma.description_short:
Summon a [color=#20af70]Musmahu[/color]
Set your [color=#20af20]Uttuk Alu[/color] [color=#78bca4]charges[/color] to 30
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when [color=#ffff50]your glory rises[/color]
[color=#a0a0a0]Musmahus are gigantic serpents of Ninhurs that spread divine grass[/color]

dorova.title: dorova
dorova.name: [color=#60b0ff]Het Dorova[/color]
dorova.description:
For each [color=#60b0ff]Dream[/color] you have, [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] yourself

Apply [color=#60b0ff]Dream[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Heal = 3 * WIL[/color]

[color=#78bca4]+2 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]enter[/color] a new area
dorova.description_short:
[color=#50ff50]Heal[/color] 20 per stack of [color=#60b0ff]Dream[/color] and remove all [color=#5070ff]Freeze[/color] from yourself
[color=#78bca4]+3 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]enter[/color] a new area

tyrana.title: tyrana
tyrana.name: [color=#60b0ff]Va Tyrana[/color]
tyrana.description:
For each [color=#60b0ff]Dream[/color] you have, [color=#ffff50]deal[/color] [color=#ffaf30]Psychic[/color] damage to the closest enemy

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = WIL[/color]

[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when apply [color=#60b0ff]Dream[/color] to yourself while an enemy lives
tyrana.description_short:
Apply [color=#60b0ff]Dream[/color] to yourself equal to your current stacks of [color=#60b0ff]Dream[/color]
[color=#78bca4]+2 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]enter[/color] a new area

muruga.title: muruga
muruga.name: [color=#60b0ff]Ra Muruga[/color]
muruga.description:
For each [color=#60b0ff]Dream[/color] you have, [color=#ffff50]deal[/color] [color=#5080ff]Ice[/color] damage to all enemies in a 2 tile range

Remove all [color=#60b0ff]Dreams[/color] from yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 10 * WIL[/color]

[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when apply [color=#60b0ff]Dream[/color] to yourself while an enemy lives
muruga.description_short:
Deal [color=#5080ff]Ice[/color] and [color=#ffaf30]Psychic[/color] damage to all enemies in a 4 tile range
[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 10 * Dream stacks[/color]
[color=#78bca4]+2 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]enter[/color] a new area

senheb.title: senheb
senheb.name: [color=#d09000]Senheb[/color]
senheb.description:
[color=#50ff50]Heal[/color] yourself and [color=#ffff50]deal[/color] [color=#a0a000]Death[/color] damage to the closest enemy

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage and heal = 2 * WIL[/color]

[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you summon a [color=#d09000]Gilded Dead[/color]
senheb.description_short:
[color=#50ff50]Heal[/color] and remove all [color=#ffd000]Corrosion[/color] from yourself
[color=#a0a0a0]Heal = your Armor[/color]
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you summon a [color=#d09000]Gilded Dead[/color]

sedjhet.title: sedjhet
sedjhet.name: [color=#d09000]Sedjhet[/color]
sedjhet.description:
[color=#ffff50]Deal[/color] [color=#a0a000]Death[/color] damage to all enemies in a 2 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = Your armor * 3[/color]

[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you summon a [color=#d09000]Gilded Dead[/color]
sedjhet.description_short:
[color=#ffff50]Deal[/color] [color=#a0a000]Death[/color] damage to all enemies in a 2 tile range
[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = your Armor[/color]
Each [color=#78bca4]charge[/color] grants [color=#5050ff]+5 Armor[/color]
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you summon a [color=#d09000]Gilded Dead[/color]

neter.title: neter
neter.name: [color=#d09000]Neter Ammah[/color]
neter.description:
Summon a [color=#d09000]Gilded Dead[/color]

[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you summon a [color=#d09000]Gilded Dead[/color]
neter.description_short:
Summon a [color=#d09000]Gilded Dead[/color]
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you summon a [color=#d09000]Gilded Dead[/color]

ti.title: ti
ti.name: [color=#ff8000]Nesh Ti[/color]
ti.description_short:
Uses [color=#78bca4]all charges[/color]
[color=#50ff50]Heal[/color] 200 [color=#a0a0a0]* charges used[/color], remove all [color=#ff7000]Scorch[/color] from self
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]enter[/color] a new area

zatu.title: zatu
zatu.name: [color=#ff8000]Nesh Zatu[/color]
zatu.description_short:
Uses [color=#78bca4]all charges[/color]
[color=#ffff50]Deal[/color] 200 [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] and [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] damage in a path to 5 enemies in a 4 tile range
[color=#a0a0a0]Repeat for each charge of Nesh Ti[/color]
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]enter[/color] a new area

girra.title: girra
girra.name: [color=#ff8000]Nesh Girra[/color]
girra.description_short:
Uses [color=#78bca4]all charges[/color]
[color=#ffff50]Deal[/color] [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] and [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] damage to adjacent units
[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = Main Hand Hit, repeat for each charge of Nesh Ti[/color]
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]enter[/color] a new area

gibija.title: gibija
gibija.name: [color=#a0a000]Gibija[/color]
gibija.description_short:
Summon 5 [color=#a0a000]Slouching Dead[/color] and remove all [color=#a0a000]Doom[/color] from yourself
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]enter[/color] a new area
[color=#a0a0a0]Slouching Dead are waddling undead servants of Eresh[/color]

sluga.title: sluga
sluga.name: [color=#a0a000]Sluga[/color]
sluga.description_short:
Summon 1 [color=#a0a000]Slouching Dead[/color]
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when an enemy [color=#ffff50]dies[/color] in a 2 tile range

razaranja.title: razaranja
razaranja.name: [color=#a0a000]Razaranja[/color]
razaranja.description_short:
[color=#ffff50]Deal[/color] [color=#a0a000]Death[/color] damage to all units in a 2 tile range
[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = total allies * 100[/color]
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when [color=#ffff50]your glory rises[/color]

contemplation.title: contemplation
contemplation.name: [color=#cf6f40]Grim Contemplation[/color]
contemplation.description_short:
[color=#50ff50]Heal[/color] yourself for 20% of max Life and remove all [color=#ffff50]Effects[/color] from yourself
Each [color=#78bca4]charge[/color] grants [color=#5050ff]+10 Armor[/color] and [color=#5050ff]+10 Block[/color]
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]enter[/color] a new area

punishment.title: punishment
punishment.name: [color=#cf6f40]Sober Punishment[/color]
punishment.description_short:
[color=#ffff50]Deal[/color] [color=#af8f50]Blunt[/color] damage in a path to one enemy
[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = your missing life[/color]
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] when you [color=#ffff50]are dealt 15 or more[/color] damage, [color=#ff5050]-1 charge[/color] when you [color=#50ff50]heal[/color]

violence.title: violence
violence.name: [color=#cf6f40]Rigid Violence[/color]
violence.description_short:
[color=#ffff50]Perform[/color] an [color=#ffff50]extra attack[/color] against an adjacent enemy
[color=#a0a0a0]Perform additional extra attacks for each point of Inflexibility[/color]
[color=#78bca4]+1 charge[/color] on [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color] with [color=#ffff50]at least 1 adjacent enemy[/color], [color=#ff5050]else -1 charge[/color]
